Name: Revertia
About the game: 2D puzzle action like Reversi! Enjoy it casually and feel the handwriting world! By turning over the panel and sandwiching the others like Reversi, you can see various actions such as making footholds, erasing obstacles, beating and dropping enemies. Make full use of the actions and solve puzzles to get to the goal!
